blogPost.excerpt: Meet Doneit, a feature packed daily planner that focuses on simplicity and organization. 🚀 With Doneit, you don't need to worry about your tasks lists ever being messy because this app was designed to help you better organize all of your daily to-do's. 🗂️
blogPost.body: Meet Doneit, a feature packed daily planner that focuses on simplicity and organization. 🚀 With Doneit, you don't need to worry about your tasks lists ever being messy because this app was designed to help you better organize all of your daily to-do's. 🗂️
blogPost.title: Doneit - Start accomplishing all your tasks quicker
blogPost.author: Daniils

localize.description: Doneit是一款功能丰富的日常计划表，它的重点是简单和组织。🚀 有了Doneit，你不必担心你的任务清单会乱七八糟，因为这个应用程序的设计是为了帮助你更好地组织你所有的日常待办事项。🗂️
localize.tagline: 更快地完成您的所有任务

localize.description: Doneit是一款功能豐富的日常計劃表，它的重點是簡單和組織。🚀 有了Doneit，你不必擔心你的任務清單會亂七八糟，因爲這個應用程序的設計是爲了幫助你更好地組織你所有的日常待辦事項。🗂️
localize.tagline: 更快地完成您的所有任務

previous.excerpt: Zen Operating System Imagine if you could design your life. ZenOS is a comprehensive personal life planner that helps you focus and live one day at a time, gaining clarity of your vision.
previous.title: ZenOS - Design your life with this personal life planner

localize.description: 禅宗操作系统 想象一下，如果你可以设计你的生活。ZenOS是一款全面的个人生活规划师，它能帮助你集中精力，一天一个样，获得清晰的愿景。
localize.tagline: 用这个个人生活计划书设计你的生活

localize.description: 禪宗操作系統 想象一下，如果你可以設計你的生活。ZenOS是一款全面的個人生活規劃師，它能幫助你集中精力，一天一個樣，獲得清晰的願景。
localize.tagline: 用這個個人生活計劃書設計你的生活

next.excerpt: We help marketers, agencies and brands to easily perform influencer lead generation across Instagram, TikTok & Pinterest. Search 3m+ profiles with 8+ filters & export selected profiles and contact data to a simple CSV file.
next.title: My Nexus - Easy influencer lead generation

localize.description: 我们帮助营销人员、代理商和品牌商在Instagram、TikTok和Pinterest上轻松地进行影响者线索生成。通过8个以上的过滤器搜索300万个以上的资料，并将选定的资料和联系人数据导出到一个简单的CSV文件。
localize.tagline: 简单的影响者线索生成

localize.description: 我們幫助營銷人員、代理商和品牌商在Instagram、TikTok和Pinterest上輕鬆地進行影響者線索生成。通過8個以上的過濾器搜索300萬個以上的資料，並將選定的資料和聯繫人數據導出到一個簡單的CSV文件。
localize.tagline: 簡單的影響者線索生成
